description: This file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock for unit testing, which implements multiple interfaces related to a persistent storage system, including methods for store operations, notifications, cache management, inspection, and limit control.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class for testing PersistentStore implementations that inherits multiple storage-related interfaces and provides mock methods for their functions.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of notifications with the store.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of notifications from the store.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in the store.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value by key from the store.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key from the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting an entire namespace from the store.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of notifications with the store for IStore2.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of notifications from the store for IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a namespaced, scoped value with TTL in the store for IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a scoped value and TTL in the store for IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespaced, scoped key from the store for IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting a scoped namespace from the store for IStore2.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving list of namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage sizes within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace.
